SELECT_REGULATION: Select a regulation to view details

REG1_DESC: This law regulates commercial courts and commercial disputes in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
REG1_ART1_TEXT: Commercial courts shall be established by a decision of the Supreme Judicial Council.
REG1_ART2_TEXT: Commercial courts shall have jurisdiction over commercial disputes.
REG1_ART3_TEXT: Judgments may be appealed within thirty days.
REG2_DESC: This law regulates the relationship between employers and employees.
REG2_ART1_TEXT: This law applies to all employees except specific categories.
REG2_ART2_TEXT: The contract must be written in Arabic.
REG3_DESC: This law regulates civil transactions between individuals.
REG3_ART1_TEXT: A contract is formed when an offer is accepted.
REG4_DESC: This law regulates criminal investigation procedures.
